amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for Planned Parenthood Federation of America, Inc.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for Planned Parenthood Federation of America, Inc.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A085) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 185, 1 Present (Roll no. 93).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
